news.title: New article in the <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite>
news.summary: Phylogenetic nomenclature of Notosuchia (Crocodylomorpha; Crocodyliformes)

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2024 election results are available.

news.title: First issue of the <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite>
news.summary: The inaugural issue of the <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite> has been published, including two articles and an editorial.

news.title: Second article of the <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite>
news.summary: Spiny Tails and Clades: A Fully Sampled Phylogeny of Hoplocercine Lizards (Iguanidae / Hoplocercinae) and its Taxonomic and Nomenclatural Implications

news.title: First article of the <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite>
news.summary: Addition to “The Phylogenetics of Teleosauroidea (Crocodylomorpha; Thalattosuchia) and Implications for Their Ecology and Evolution”

news.title: <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite>
news.summary: The <cite>Bulletin of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite> is now taking submissions for its inaugural issue.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2021 election results are available.

news.title: New books: <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite> and <cite><abbr title="Phylonyms: a Companion to the PhyloCode">Phylonyms</abbr></cite>
news.summary: New books present the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>, an evolution-based system for naming organisms.

news.title: RegNum (Beta Release)
news.summary: A beta version of the Registration Database is online.

news.title: Publication of the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>
news.summary: <cite>The International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature</cite> has been published.

news.title: Publication of the Companion Volume
news.summary: <cite>Phylonyms: A Companion to the <abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>, has been published.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2020 election results are available.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2019 election results are available.

news.title: PhyloCode Version 5 Draft Posted
news.summary: Version 5 of the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite> has been made avaliable online. Version 6 is in progress.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2018 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of <cite>Phylonyms</cite>, the companion volume to the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2017 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of <cite>Phylonyms</cite>, the companion volume to the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2016 election results are available.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2015 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of <cite>Phylonyms</cite>, the companion volume to the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite>.

news.title: <cite>PhyloCode</cite> 5.0 Beta Version
news.summary: A new version of the <cite>PhyloCode</cite> will be posted once the Preface and Index have been completed. A beta version is available on request.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of Phylonyms, the companion volume to the PhyloCode. The manuscript is scheduled to be submitted to the publisher by 1 September 2014.

news.title: Election Results
news.summary: <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> 2014 election results are available.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Philip Cantino reports on the progress of the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr> Companion Volume</cite>.

news.title: Species Amendment Proposed
news.summary: A proposal to amend the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite> with respect to species has been posted.

news.title: Companion Volume: Progress Report
news.summary: Kevin de Queiroz reports on the progress of the <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr> Companion Volume</cite>.

news.title: <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite> Version 4c
news.summary: Version 4c of the draft <cite><abbr title="International Code of Phylogenetic Nomenclature">PhyloCode</abbr></cite> has been posted online.

news.title: Third Meeting
news.summary: The third meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, 20–22 July 2008.

news.title: Second Meeting
news.summary: The second meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut, 28 June–2 July 2006.

news.title: First Meeting
news.summary: The first meeting of the <abbr title="International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature">ISPN</abbr> was held at Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle in Paris, France 6–9 July 2004.
